mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY G.GOODS_NUM DESC) RNUM, G.*, M.MEM_ID, NVL(GL.TOTAL_COUNT, 0) AS TOTAL_COUNT2 FROM GOODS G, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M, ( SELECT GOODS_LIKE_PARENT, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM GOODS_LIKE GROUP BY GOODS_LIKE_PARENT ) GL WHERE G.GOODS_SELLER = M.MEM_NUM(+) AND G.GOODS_NUM = GL.GOODS_LIKE_PARENT(+) AND G.GOODS_DEL_GB = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET GOODS_DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
